short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get HTML / CSS / Javascript tips when you open a new tab in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a Google Chrome extension to show HTML/CSS/Javascript tips in new tabs! This is for anyone learning HTML/CSS and Javascript. Many users learning to code have their own flashcards & notes. So this will help them out with an extra dash of technology!
